FuncDef:
The traffic-statistic command enables the traffic statistics function of DAA.
The undo traffic-statistic command disables the traffic statistics function of DAA.
By default, the traffic statistics function is disabled for DAA.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To collect traffic statistics about DAA services for accounting, run the traffic-statistic command in the traffic behavior view. If the command is not run, traffic statistics about DAA services collected is 0.
Prerequisites
A traffic behavior has been defined using the traffic behavior command.The DAA traffic policing function has been enabled using the car command.

Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
The traffic-statistic command is valid only for DAA services.
The traffic-statistic command is mutually exclusive with the traffic-policy outbound vxlan-mode command in the bridge domain view .
